I'm sorry to hear that your recovery phone for the account has been changed. If this was not intentional on your part, please check what happened by following these steps:

1. Go to [this link](https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?Email=elishapoc@gmail.com&continue=https://myaccount.google.com/alert/nt/1766043760187?rfn%3D4%26rfnc%3D1%26eid%3D2681494567154482216%26et%3D0) to verify the activity.
2. You can also view security activity at [this link](https://myaccount.google.com/notifications).

If you need further assistance, please feel free to reach out.

[image: Google]
2-Step Verification turned on


elishapoc@gmail.com

Your Google Account elishapoc@gmail.com is now protected with 2-Step
Verification. When you sign in on a new or untrusted device, you’ll need
your second factor to verify your identity.

*Don't get locked out!*
You can add a backup phone or get backup codes to use when you don’t have
your second factor with you.
